CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: With film annealing treatments , the films form larger crystal grains and better film interconnectivity , which are favorable for the charge transport and lead to an increase of the mobility .

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| film |
| films |
| crystal grains |
| film interconnectivity |
| charge transport |
| mobility |

In this paragraph, the term "film" and "films" are used to refer to a material or a layer of material, so they can be considered as "Material Name" entities. Similarly, "crystal grains" and "film interconnectivity" are also materials or parts of materials, so they can be considered as "Material Name" entities. Lastly, "charge transport" and "mobility" are properties of materials, so they can also be considered as "Material Name" entities.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| film |
| films |

In this paragraph, the term "film" and "films" are used to refer to a material or a layer of material, so they can be considered as "Material Name" entities. The other terms "crystal grains", "film interconnectivity", "charge transport" and "mobility" are not clearly refer to a specific material, they are properties or characteristics of materials, so they are not "Material Name" entities.

Explanation:

* "which are favorable for the charge transport" is a description of the effect of the property value, not a property value itself.
* "lead to" is a description of the consequence of the property value, not a property value itself.
